title: Ever since she did not receive raise Enid has lack

content.prompt: For several weeks – ever since she did not receive a raise that was given to several colleagues – Enid has lacked energy, has been unable to go to work, and has expected bad things to happen every day. Of the following, she is most likely experiencing

topic.text: 5.4: Selection of Categories of Psychological Disorders

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
